events.title: Reels of fire
events.description: Do you want to create an edge of the seat experience; or do you want address social issues?Do you want to recreate friendship or do you want to celebrate love?The screen is all yours.We give you Reels of Fire, a national level shortfilm contest as part of Instincts.Our expert panel will pick 10 of the best shortfilms and present it on the big screen to be judged by expert directors and technicians of the Tamil Cinema Industry. Witness the clash of ten titans as they fight to grab that Best Film Award.Come join us and experience the revolutionary era of shortfilms. Presenting you the 9th edition of Reels of Fire, hosted by SFC.
events.rules: Rules and Regulations;1) No specific theme. All genres are welcome;2) Subtitles are Mandatory for films that are not of Tamil and English language;3) The total duration of Shortfilm including the opening and closing credits should not exceed 15 mins;4) Obscenity will not be tolerated. Censor with beeps wherever required;5) The entry fee is Rs 199 per film.Payment should be made via Google Pay (Akhilesh - 9566541842) with your shortfilm's name as the description.;6) One Person can send more than one film but each film will carry an entry fee of Rs 199; 7) The decision of the Judges will be final;8) Send your short films to reelsoffire2019@gmail.com either as drive links or YouTube links;9) Entries after the deadline (March 1 2019) will not be entertained.
